I am Bilingual - Python and R Preface

I am Bilingual - Python and R Priyanga Dilini Talagala Thiyanga S. Talagala 2023-03-13 Preface Whether you’re an R user looking to learn Python, a Python user looking to learn R, or simply looking for a comprehensive source to learn both languages, this book is for you! With “R and PYTHON: WE ARE BILINGUAL,” you’ll gain a thorough understanding of both R and/or Python and learn how to use them together to solve complex problems. This book is still in progress in various draft forms.
